name: unlyrical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not lyrical (= expressing personal thoughts and feelings in a beautiful way): The critics called his new collection of poetry bland, cold, and unlyrical. It's one of the most unlyrical songs I have ever heard.
More examplesFewer examplesNew operas do not come along that often, so it's a great disappointment that this latest one has been criticized as unlyrical by reviewers.If you don't want your work to come across as unlyrical, it's best to simply forget about style and write from the heart.This poem is deliberately unlyrical as the poet questions conventional ideas of beauty.
